built: token-measure.sh: per-role before/after token measurement (file-based vs SQL-based), stores in token_measurements table, JSON and TOON output formats
token-audit-report.sh: phase-level token savings summary with PASS/WARN/FAIL verdict, baseline comparison, per-role breakdown, stores in token_audit_reports table
roadmap-dedup.bats: 7 integration tests validating ROADMAP triplication eliminated (critic/architect/lead get targeted SQL data, total < 2x ROADMAP)
dev-context-reduction.bats: 6 integration tests validating Dev context reduction (SQL < file tokens, spec field present, plan isolation, budget compliance)
architect-budget.bats: 7 integration tests validating Architect budget overflow fix (SQL stays within 5000 budget, no lossy truncation, key sections preserved)
token_audit_reports table: phase-level aggregates with verdict classification
sg: Run token-audit-report.sh --phase 10 after all plans complete for final Phase 10 success validation
Consider wiring token-measure.sh into SessionStart hook for continuous monitoring
